tweets.text: I grew up living a few hundred metres from a landfill site in Sneyd Green in the 1990s and I don't remember ever even smelling anything from it, let alone being unwell. @RedIndustries2 maybe you could take some tips from how they did it in the olden days #stopthestink  @EnvAgency

One of the largest manufacturing bases for the AstraZeneca vaccine, (Keele), is currently experiencing an environmental disaster as a local landfill emits toxic gases on a daily basis, affecting the staff maybe even the rollout. National media silence is deafening. Whats going on

tweets.text: On the infamous big weekend stink of @RedIndustries2 Walley‚Äôs Quarry,the @EnvAgencyMids received thousands of complaints to their emergency number. No one came out and no data was collected.That tells you everything you need to know about the effectiveness of the EA.#stopthestink https://t.co/Tc3t6CrWb9

Rather curiously there hasn't been a single Tweet from the @EnvAgency in the last 24 hours bragging about how they 'Enhance", the environment.

https://t.co/WaaFQXr1lZ

Every time it gets a little better we get hopeful, then BANG üïõüî•üîä‚ò£‚ÄºÔ∏è‚ÄºÔ∏è‚ÄºÔ∏èand our hopes die again @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @JamesBevanEA @MattHancock @ErinBrockovich @MrNickKnowles @MPGeorgeEustice #stopthestink https://t.co/RH9xqgh7An

@DanielHewittITV We too are being forgotten! #walleysquarry has no gas management!Toxic landfill gas is being released into the air and filling up homes,schools &hospitals!12k+ complaints to @EnvAgency & it‚Äôs getting worse!We need evacuating too!Help us @itvnews #stopthestink @StinkStopthe https://t.co/AEUoqJHiph

Surely there's a typo - should be 'The Environment Agency's job is to balance the needs of industry,' not 'people and the environment.' They do this by allowing toxic gas to be released into the air, our homes, our lungs. Thanks. @EnvAgency #stopthestink #wasteofpaper https://t.co/QCnCnQhtui
@ball_helen @MarkCheetham @ChrisBaingerEA @EnvAgencyMids @ShropsWildlife Absolutely awful in the 21st Century when we know what we do about the damage to the environment, biodiversity and health.

@SianieRoo @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe @PHE_EoEngland You're so right. The people who have organised the campaigns and the community generally have been kind, supportive, and tireless in their advocacy and solidarity. I'll also be donating what I can afford and keep praying that an end to this horrendous situation is in sight [2/2]

@SianieRoo @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe @PHE_EoEngland We're 1.2 miles away and it's unbearable. I am breathing it in as we speak. I'm considering getting a purifier but they're really expensive and the burden shouldn't be on us: it shouldn't be an issue and we shouldn't be subjected to this poor level of air quality [1/2]

Do we really want our rail safety workers to be repeatedly be having poor sleep quality due to landfill fumes?! Surely not @PHE_EoEngland @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @BBCPanorama @StinkStopthe https://t.co/UEwZl0ZHbe

tweets.text: Our @Plastic_EU #PreventingPlasticPollution colleagues from the @EnvAgency are co-hosting a free biz event on Mon 19 April. Focusing on #Solent biz/orgs but others welcome to join online to discuss plastic reduction/best practice. Book via https://t.co/OR8DCTfSGR https://t.co/rZZLLIY9tU

Join us at this FREE preventing #plasticpollution workshop and find out about support available to tackle plastic pollution!

Co-hosted by the @EnvAgency, @GreentechSouth and the Hampshire and Isle of Wight Sustainable Business Network.

Register here: https://t.co/Pc2FbhkH9G

tweets.text:
Just 14% of English rivers are of good ecological standard, according to the @EnvAgency.

Just 7% of the UK's woodlands are in a good condition, according to the @WoodlandTrust.

We think we're a green and pleasant land, but it's a myth. When are we going to value nature?

@HMUG_Hackney @Hillfortian @PymmesBrookERS @StonebridgeLock @RiverChess @Feargal_Sharkey @mayorofhackney @deedeelea @AquiferChalk @RiverActionUK @AnglingTrust @WildTroutTrust @WindrushWasp @ChilternSociety @Chilternstreams @CleanIlkley @RiverBeane @BuryLung @FriendsRib @ReviveTheWye @RachSalv @UnderwaterMedia @suesustainable @DougskiK @stormwater_jo @RussellB1ggs @PJennings88 @EnvAgency @Ofwat @riverstrust @Thames21 @gis_michelle @theriverstrust Don't be worried about asking for help, we all want to work together for the same goal. You'll find plenty on here wanting to support you.

@HMUG_Hackney @Hillfortian @PymmesBrookERS @StonebridgeLock @RiverChess @Feargal_Sharkey @mayorofhackney @deedeelea @AquiferChalk @RiverActionUK @AnglingTrust @WildTroutTrust @WindrushWasp @ChilternSociety @Chilternstreams @CleanIlkley @RiverBeane @BuryLung @FriendsRib @ReviveTheWye @RachSalv @UnderwaterMedia @suesustainable @DougskiK @KarenShackleto5 @stormwater_jo @RussellB1ggs @PJennings88 @EnvAgency @Ofwat @riverstrust @Thames21 @theriverstrust We've set up a bathing water knowledge hub on slack to share experience between groups looking to apply for Bw designation or monitor water quality: https://t.co/p4C4cQHSHt 
Also there is the #endsewagepollution coalition chaired by @amyslack84
